Title: Vintage Mens 1957 Bulova "MIDNIGHT CLIPPER" 17J Selfwinding 10K RGP Serviced Bla
Description: This Handsome Mens 10k Rolled Gold Plate Bulova "MIDNIGHT CLIPPER" (appropriately named with the Black Dial) was manufactured using the 17 Jewel 11ACAC Swiss Bulova Selfwnding Movement manufactured in 1957. This Scalloped Edges and Black Dial Bulova originally sold with an Expansion Band in 1957 for $71.50!!! A complete Work of Art which belongs in any Watch Collection and with the brand new leather band can be worn right out of the box. Excellent Running Condition Bulova is marked on the Dial, Movement, Inside and Outside of the case 17 Jewels Black Dial in great original condition, but some of the letters for SELFWINDING are difficult to read (please see my pictures!) Sweep Second Hand Brand New Crystal Scalloped Edges on edge of case 37.7mm Lug to Lug X 30mm wide without Crown Lug width 16mm 10k Yellow Rolled Gold Plate case in Excellent Condition Complimentary Black Genuine Leather Band Movement Marked - BULOVA WATCH Co. 11ACAC 17JEWELS SEVENTEEN L7 SWISS UNADJUSTED BXW Inside case marked - BULOVA 10K ROLLED GOLD PLATEBEZEL STAINLESS BACK NEW YORK Outside case marked - BULOVA STAINLESS STEEL BACK SHOCK RESISTANT 0660238 L7 ANTI-MAGNETIC SELF WINDING WATER PROOF This watch was lovingly worn by it's previous owner(s). Even so, I had it serviced recently. This "MIDNIGHT CLIPPER would make an incredible addition to any collection and the winner of my auction will be able to wear it right out of the box! My 90 year old father and I have Bought, Sold and Collected watches for the last 50 years and owned a Jewelry Store for over 20 years. Please note that you are bidding on the watch and I am including the pictured band as an add-on so you can wear it right out of the box. Remember that the watch is over 59 years old and is NOT NEW! EVERY 59 year old watch will show some signs of wear or aging. I make every attempt to describe my items accurately and take good pictures. So PLEASE LOOK AT THE PICTURES so there are NO SURPRISES! SORRY, NO INTERNATIONAL SHIPPING!
